Actions.Name: Get bttn info
Actions.Description: Gets the bttn device identification information.

Actions.Name: Get list of bttns
Actions.Description: Gets list of bttns associated with the account.

Actions.Name: When a bttn is pressed
Actions.Description: Trigger a flow with a press of a bttn.

Actions.Name: Return Flow result
Actions.Description: Reflect Flow result via bttn device lights.
